title: Again with the letters, Etsy!
content:
I should really stop looking at [Etsy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420114958/http:/www.etsy.com/view_listing.php?listing_id=36235195)!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420114958im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typo_rpillow_5986.jpg)

Cute idea.
author: mica

comments.content:
Clever, and tasteful! A button mosaic.
